security: Password protection, IP address filtering, HTTPS encryption, IEEE 802.1X network access control, Digest authentication, User access log
framerate: H.264: Up to 25/30 fps (50/60 Hz) in all resolutions Motion JPEG: Up to 25/30 fps (50/60 Hz) in all resolutions
networkingprotocol: IPv4/v6, HTTP, HTTPS, SSL/TLS, QoS Layer 3 DiffServ, FTP, CIFS/SMB, SMTP, Bonjour, UPnPTM, SNMPv1/v2c/v3 (MIB-II), DNS, DynDNS, NTP, RTSP, RTP, TCP, UDP, IGMP, RTCP, ICMP, DHCP, ARP, SOCKS
ports: IP66-rated multi-connector for DC power, Ethernet 10BASE-T/100BASE-TX and I/O, including 5 m (16 ft) cable
